import React from'react';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import{useCart}from"./CartProvider";// credit for stickiness: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/40515142/how-to-make-a-sticky-footer-in-react
import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var phantom={display:'block',padding:'20px',height:'80px',width:'100%'};var style={backgroundColor:"#F8F8F8",borderTop:"1px solid #E7E7E7",textAlign:"center",padding:"20px",position:"fixed",left:"0",bottom:"0",height:"60px",width:"100%"};export default function Cart(){const{cartToString,subtotal,clearCart}=useCart();const alertCart=()=>{const txt=cartToString();alert(txt);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"container",style:phantom,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:style,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"col-4",children:["Subtotal: $",subtotal.toFixed(2)>0?subtotal.toFixed(2):-1*subtotal.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"col-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",class:"menu-button",onClick:()=>alertCart(),children:"Order"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"col-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",class:"menu-button",onClick:clearCart,children:"Clear"})})]})})})});}
